alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Ogle; Winnebago (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 8:43PM CDT until July 28 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL OGLE...NORTHWESTERN DE KALB AND SOUTHEASTERN WINNEBAGO COUNTIES... At 843 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cherry Valley, or 7 miles southwest of Belvidere, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Rockford, Rockford Airport, Cherry Valley, Kirkland, New Milford, Monroe Center and Fairdale. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 113 and 123. I-90 between mile markers 17 and 18. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
